DOC.criteria: sepsis or severe sepsis or severe infections in the previous 48 hours treatment with imipenem/cilastatin (recommended by hospital microbiologists) expected duration of hospital stays in the ICU ≥ 72 h from recruitment recruited patients agreed to participate in this trial, and had set up a signed informed consent with an allergy to carbapenems or with an adverse drug reaction to imipenem acute or chronic renal failure assessed by serum creatinine concentrations > 280 μmol/L (or creatinine clearance <20mL/min) or those requiring continuous renal replacement therapy drug or alcohol abuse Pregnant and lactant women patients near to death
